•  Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown. 
•  Serve with syrup and your favorite toppings. •

•  Let cool before slicing. •  Cook in the skillet until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy.

•  Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender.

•  Serve with salsa.
